shortDescription.default: Horizontally scrollable card view for SharePoint lists.

longDescription.default: Displays SharePoint list items in a horizontal, card-style layout. Ideal for highlighting content such as team members, products, or events in a visually engaging, scrollable format.

features.title: List Card Scroller Web Part
features.description: Deploys the List Card Scroller web part to all SharePoint sites in your tenant.
